title: errant First Act Scene II continuo performance

content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.

The notation given is correct but the performance, which includes only the continuo part and does not include the vocal part, includes an error. In realizing the cadential 64 chord, what error does the harpsichord player make?

choices.label: The 64 chord is performed on a weak beat rather than on the strong beat as written.
The notes of the 64 chord are not resolved using stepwise motion to the dominant.
The 64 chord triples the bass and omits the root.
The wrong note is doubled in the right hand of the 64 chord.

unit.text: 5: Harmony and Voice Leading II - Chord Progressions and Predominant Function

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
